PREFERRED DATES: Please choose 3 dates in order of preference and we'll make every effort to accomodate your first choice, but would like to respond with others if it is unavailable. All dates are Sunday - Friday.

You should plan to arrive after 3:00 PM on Sunday afternoon and before 6:00- PM and depart after 11:00 AM on the following Friday.

A determination email will be sent within 48 hours of our receipt of your request.

Genesee Home Calendar

For any week listed below we have at least four bedrooms open. If a week indicates that there are 1 or 2 rooms available this means that all of our king bedrooms are taken and that only the queen bedrooms, Garden and Hosselkus are open. If you would like a date that is closed please call to be put on our waiting list.

EXPENSE REIMBURSEMENT :
The majority of Genesee Home expenses are covered by donations in order to reduce the cost passed along to the guests. The cost to you generally reflects only about 1/3 of Genesee Home's operating costs, and is to cover reimbursement for meals served and other expenses. A week's visit to Genesee Home costs $395.00 per room which includes lodging, all meals and recreation.

Please list your 1st, 2nd, and 3rd choice of accommodations. We will do our best to honor your choice of room; however, rooms are assigned on a "first come-first serve" basis.

ROOM (click on room to view a picture of the room and a description of its amenities)
Garden Room 258 sq. ft.
Genesee Room 365 sq. ft.
Hosselkus Room 321 sq. ft.
Meadow Room 426 sq. ft.
Parlor Room 417 sq. ft

SCHOLARSHIP OPPORTUNITIES
The Board of Genesee Home offers limited scholarship help for Couples who need assistance in visiting Genesee Home.

Yes, I will apply on the Scholarship page

We are unable to accommodate children or pets. A visit to Genesee Home is not intended to be a vacation; it is a restful setting where you and your spouse can be refreshed, restored and renewed through time alone, time with God and interaction with each other.
